page.title: 08The Church Choir.Markyate
page.content: { THE CHURCH CHOIR At our church we have a choir made up of five adults and about twenty children.We are divided into teams, A and B. Each has a team leader.I am one and my friend is the other.We have a choir mistress who often has a helper. We have choir practice on Wednesday from 6:30 till 7:30 and we sing at the Communion Service on Sunday at 9:30 to 10:45.We get awarded marks for every choir practice or service.You have a cross for "fail",one tick for "reasonable",two ticks for "very good" and three ticks for "excellent". We add each teams' marks up and the team with the most marks gets a prize each term. We get paid 3p for every practice and service.We also get paid for weddings which is 40p but sometimes when there is more money or
